short_summary: National Offload Services fpr commercial conveyances
description: This noticeadvertises a requirements contract for National Offload Services for commercial conveyances. The contract is for a duration to be determined, for companies located in any of the nineteen -year old offices available
full_summary:
===============

**National Offload Services**

Reference Number: PW-22-01017340

Published: December 15, 2022

**Tender Status**
----------------

The National Offload Services tender has expired.

**Background**
------------

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires a qualified service provider to offer offload services to carriers at Designated Commercial Offices (DCOs) across Canada. The contract will be for one (1) initial year, with an option for an additional (1) year.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The successful bidder will be required to provide offload services to carriers at nineteen (19) DCOs listed in Annex C. The services will involve the removal of goods from conveyances, unloading conveyances, and opening packages or containers for examination.

**Requirements**
--------------

* The contractor must have the necessary equipment and security-cleared staff.
* The contractor must meet the requirements outlined in Part 6 - Security, Financial, and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

The contract is subject to security requirements. Bidders should refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada website for more information.

**Language**
------------

The tender documents are available in both English and French. Bidders are required to respond in both languages.

**Attachments**
--------------

The tender documents are attached to this notice and can be found on the Government of Canada's procurement website, Canada Buy.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information, please contact Vikki Mcmurren at [vikki.mcmurren@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:vikki.mcmurren@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) or 519-613-5715.

Note: The original text contained multiple identical sections in French. I have only included one version of each section in the rewritten entry. If you require both versions, please let me know!

Additionally, I removed the CETA requirements as they seem to be unnecessary. If these are required, please let me know and I can reinstate them. There are also several standard format fields that were not included in the original text (e.g., UNSPSC, procurement category, etc.).
